Package com.xebisco.yield

Class DrawInstruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.DrawInstruction
  • public class DrawInstruction
extends java.lang.Object
    It's a data structure that holds all the information needed to draw a rectangle, oval, text, line, or image

        public boolean isUiLayer()
        The function returns a boolean value indicating whether the current layer is a user interface layer or not.

        The method is returning a boolean value, which is determined by the value of the variable `uiLayer`.

      • setUiLayer

        public void setUiLayer​(boolean uiLayer)
        This function sets the value of a boolean variable called "uiLayer".
        Parameters:
        uiLayer - The parameter `uiLayer` is a boolean variable that is used to set the value of the `uiLayer` instance variable of the class. It determines whether the current draw instruction is in the user interface layer or not.
